name: Ahoy Ma-Tea!
description:
Fresh out of culinary school, you're faced with all an adult life entails; balancing your debts, running a successful teahouse, trying to keep a playful kraken from sinking your boat and managing your friendships and love life...

A small game, where your goal is to pay off a loan.

Fun things included in this game:

  • A very simple cooking and selling system
  • You can decorate your living space to some extent
  • Expand your menu by improving your Kitchen
  • Become friends with or romance characters

Due to time constraints, I couldn't implement everything I wanted to; expect updates to rectify this.

Made for PaperJam 4
